episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Brendan in
the forest.

It looked like he was searching for something,
but as [Name:PlayerNickname ] called out
to help...

Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Fancy running
into you here!
Huh? You’ll help me look for what I lost?
Oh, it’s not like that!
I didn’t lose anything!

I was looking for Berries that’d be good as
materials for Pokéblocks.

Oh! If you didn’t know, Pokéblocks are a kind of
candy you can use to improve your Pokémon’s
condition.

I was trying to gather rare Berries for a truly
amazing one, but I’m having trouble finding any.
(Share your Berries with him.)
Huh?! You sure?
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! This is great!
(Tell him where to find a Berry tree.)

Oh, wow. I didn’t realize you could find Berries in
places like that!
Since we’re here, let’s pick them together later!
Huh? Why am I suddenly interested in Pokéblocks?

Well, lately I’ve been thinking I should try my hand
at Pokémon contests, not just battling.

You see, Lisia’s been inviting me to try them,
since back when we were in Hoenn.

But until now, I’ve always prioritized Pokémon
battling and adventuring, so I never had the
chance.
Plus, it seems Lisia’s inviting May, too!
And if she joins, I can’t lose to her!

So I’m gonna train in secret and surprise
them both!
Oh, I know!
Care to train with me?

You’re trustworthy, and I get the feeling you can
keep a secret from May and Wally!
You will? Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
All right! Next time, we’ll do some secret training!
All right! The coast is clear!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Brendan used the
stage to continue their secret contest training.

That was great thanks to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

With those Pokéblocks you helped me make,
my Pokémon’s in peak condition.

And with you as my partner, I was able to
practice my appeal!
I could take on a contest anytime!
Thanks again, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
By the way...

You really can do anything, huh. You surprise me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Instead of the two of us practicing together,
you ended up having to teach me.
Hmm... You know what?

Maybe my greatest contest rival is you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

When they hold a contest on Pasio,
you should join!
If we ever compete against each other on stage...
we’ll be secret rivals who trained together!
